doc:
Beulah Poynter https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beulah_Poynter 0 Beulah Poynter (June 6, 1883 – August 13, 1960) was an American author, playwright and actor. Though her career touched on Broadway and Hollywood, Poynter was better known for her starring rôles with stock and touring companies and as a prolific author of mystery and romance stories. Poynter was probably best remembered by theatergoers for her title rôle in Lena Rivers, a drama she had reworked for the stage from the novel by Mary J. Holmes. Beulah_Poynter ( June_6_,_1883 – August_13_,_1960 ) was an_American_author , playwright_and_actor . Though her_career touched on Broadway_and_Hollywood , Poynter was_better_known for her_starring_rôles with stock and touring companies and as a_prolific_author of mystery_and_romance_stories . Poynter was_probably_best_remembered by theatergoers for her_title_rôle in Lena_Rivers , a_drama she had_reworked for the_stage from the_novel by Mary_J._Holmes .
